title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is David Sirota and he has become a major political figure and commentator in American progressive... <!--more--> politics.
He is a journalist, nationally syndicated columnist with the Denver Post, San Francisco Chronicle and others and a radio host on Clear Channel based in Denver, CO.
He was described by the New York Times as a “popular rabble rouser” who identifies with the grassroots levels to stir our voices against the forces of wealth, power and invested interests that govern the ruling political and financial paradigm dominating American policy making today.
He is also the senior editor of In These Times magazine.
